name: gitea
description: Gitea is a self-hosted Git service providing code hosting, pull requests, issues, CI, and container registry in a lightweight binary. It offers a polished web UI and runs on modest hardware, ideal for developer teams.
features: Git Repository Hosting: Host unlimited Git repositories with a polished web interface and Git protocol support.
Pull Requests: Review code changes with inline comments, approvals, and merge conflict resolution.
Issue Tracking: Manage bugs and features with labels, milestones, and project boards.
Built-In CI/CD: Run automated workflows with Gitea Actions compatible with GitHub Actions syntax.
Container Registry: Host Docker images and OCI containers with integrated package management.
Lightweight Binary: Single executable with minimal resource requirements runs on modest hardware.
Organization Management: Create teams, manage permissions, and organize repositories by organization.
API Access: Comprehensive REST API for automation and integration with external tools.
